titleInfo.title: Minhāj al-dukkān wa-dustūr al-a‘yān منهاج الدكّان ودستور الأعيان al-Kūhīn al-ʻAṭṭār, Abū al-Munā ibn Abī Nāṣr الكوهين العطار، أبو المنى ابن أبي نصر and other anonymous treatises on pharmacology and opthalmology

physicalDescription.extent: Material: PaperDimensions: 250 x 190 mm leaf [165 x 100 mm written]Foliation: British Museum foliation in pencilRuling: Misṭarah; 19 lines per page; vertical spacing 13 lines per 10 cmScript: NaskhInk: Black with rubrics (rublics omitted on ff. 86r-95v)Binding: British Museum bindingCondition: Excellent; minor water damage to lower margin towards back of volumeMarginalia: Very few; a long note in Persian on abjad alphanumerics and the Islamic months is found on ff. 5v-6rSeals: Ff. 1r, 1v, 139v

mods.abstract: A collection of texts on pharmacology and opthalmology transcribed in 715 AH/AD 1315-16 (see colophon of third item, f. 139v, lines 11).Contents:(1) al-Kūhīn al-ʻAṭṭār (الكوهين العطار), Minhāj al-dukkān wa-dustūr al-a‘yān(منهاج الدكّان ودستور الأعيان) (ff. 1v-95v);(2) Fragments of texts on opthalmology and related subjects (ff. 96r-121v);(3) Anonymous and untitled treatise on pharmacology (ff. 122v-139v).
